original:
During the medieval period, scenes embodying the gothic humanist theme were prevalent across Europe, though not all examples have survived in their original form. Among the notable works are the frescoes in St. Mary's Church in Beram, which remain largely intact and are considered some of the finest examples of medieval art in Istria.

One prominent figure in this artistic movement is Paolo Veneziano, a renowned painter from the Venetia
sampled:
During the medieval phase, scenes embodying the gothic humanist theme were prevalent across Europe, though not all examples have survived in their original expression. Among these notable works are the frescoes in St. Mary's Church from Beram, which remain largely intact and are considered some out this finest examples in medieval art in Istria.

One prominent figure in this artistic movement is Paolo Veneziano, a renowned painter from the Venetia
